# Import
import pulp

# Define LP type and model
model = pulp.LpProblem('WRM_Task', pulp.LpMaximize)

# Decision variables
x1 = pulp.LpVariable('x1', lowBound=0)
x2 = pulp.LpVariable('x2', lowBound=0)

# Objective function Z
model += 5*x1 + 3*x2

# Constraints
model += x1 + x2 <= 10 # no more than 10 mio. m^3
model += x2 >= 2 # minimum env. flow
model += x1 <= 8 # maximum flow to irrigation
model += x1 <= 2*x2
